Sequence Information.Peptide Name: L8-1 (Synthetic AMPs, PG-1 derived, UCBB1ad, Arg-rich)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (64.29%) toCyclic L27-11R: 29%, K: 21%, P=L: 14%.Activity: Active against P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 or PAO1 (MIC 8 ug/ml), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 8 ug/ml), and S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 8 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Srinivas N, Jetter P, Ueberbacher BJ, Werneburg M, Zerbe K, Steinmann J, Van der Meijden B, Bernardini F, Lederer A, Dias RL, Misson PE, Henze H, Zumbrunn J, Gombert FO, Obrecht D, Hunziker P, Schauer S, Ziegler U, KÃ¤ch A, Eberl L, Riedel K, DeMarco SJ, Robinson JA. 2010
Literature Information.Title: Peptidomimetic antibiotics target outer-membrane biogenesis in Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
